mapper.select:
/* ProdPrintYnMapper.getSideMenuProdPrintYnList */
SELECT A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, A.SDSEL_GRP_NM, NVL(A.FIX_PROD_FG, '0') AS SDSEL_GRP_FIX_PROD_FG, NVL(A.SDSEL_TYPE_FG, 'C') AS SDSEL_TYPE_FG, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, B.SDSEL_QTY, NVL(B.REQUIRE_YN, 'N') AS REQUIRE_YN, FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, D.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM, C.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD, D.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM, NVL(C.FIX_PROD_FG, '0') AS FIX_PROD_FG, NVL(C.PRINT_YN, 'Y') AS PRINT_YN
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP A, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS B, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD C, TB_HQ_PRODUCT D WHERE 1=1 AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpCd}||'%'
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpNm}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassCd}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassNm}||'%'
AND C.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdCd}||'%'
AND D.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdNm}||'%'
AND NVL(C.PRINT_YN, 'Y') = #{printYn}
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.SDSEL_GRP_CD = A.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND D.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= C.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.PROD_CD (+)= C.PROD_CD ORDER BY A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, C.PROD_CD
SELECT A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, A.SDSEL_GRP_NM, NVL(A.FIX_PROD_FG, '0') AS SDSEL_GRP_FIX_PROD_FG, NVL(A.SDSEL_TYPE_FG, 'C') AS SDSEL_TYPE_FG, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, B.SDSEL_QTY, NVL(B.REQUIRE_YN, 'N') AS REQUIRE_YN, FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{storeCd}, D.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM, C.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD, D.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM, NVL(C.FIX_PROD_FG, '0') AS FIX_PROD_FG, NVL(C.PRINT_YN, 'Y') AS PRINT_YN
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP A, TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS B, TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD C, TB_MS_PRODUCT D WHERE 1=1 AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpCd}||'%'
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpNm}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassCd}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassNm}||'%'
AND C.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdCd}||'%'
AND D.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdNm}||'%'
AND NVL(C.PRINT_YN, 'Y') = #{printYn}
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.SDSEL_GRP_CD = A.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND D.STORE_CD (+)= C.STORE_CD AND D.PROD_CD (+)= C.PROD_CD ORDER BY A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, C.PROD_CD
